programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Part 1

programme.title: Part 2

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E01, After 46 years, LA homicide detectives take a Lover's Lane bandit who also gunned down two police officers into custody. Then, DNA testing helps lead police in Florida to a suspected killer, however, the killer has an identical twin.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (#1)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E01, Looks at how law enforcers stick with cases for many years, using fresh evidence to win convictions or to free prisoners who were wrongfully jailed. We examine the unsolved murder of Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E18, New DNA technology and the national DNA databank help police hunt down a rapist-killer 11 years after he committed his crimes, and a detective's painstaking recreation of a woman's shooting death proves it wasn't an accident.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

programme.title: Traces Of Murder/The Bathtub Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E09, A killer helps convict himself when he boasts about his crime to prison cellmates; and New Hampshire investigators probing the murder of a pregnant woman found raped, strangled, and dumped into her bathtub, get a new lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E14, 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her charred body is found at a popular hangout spot in the Arizona desert. When a second victim is discovered in a mineshaft, detectives suspect the killer may have known them both.

programme.title: Vanished in Virginia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E05, When a 30-year-old mother fails to report for duty in Virginia, the Army lists her as AWOL. Her family immediately suspects foul play. They embark on a 13-year quest for answers before an eyewitness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers
MST3K: Teen-Age Strangler, 19931107000000 +0000, Mike and the 'bots watch the dreary educational short Is This Love? (1957) and the horrifyingly bad Teenage Strangler (1964).

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K Turkey Day!
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E21, A compilation of new introductions for the infamous Turkey Day marathon as well as a nostalgic look back on the Comedy Central fan-favorite marathon of Mystery Science Theater.
MST3K: The Dead Talk Back, 19940730000000 +0000, Metaphysics helps to solve a murder case while Mike and the Bots impersonate the Grateful Dead.
The Giant Gila Monster, 20020612000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Radar Men From The Moon - Chapter 1: Moon Rocket
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E01, The first episode of the 1952 serial featuring Commander Cody's trip to the moon.
MST3K: The She-Creature, 19970405000000 +0000, The SOL crew is subjected to a dark, dreary tale of hypnotism, murder, and chesty amphibians.

programme.title: Backlot: The History Of MST3K, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E49, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Young Man's Fancy
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E24, A story sponsored by the Edison Electric Institute that encourages use of a number of home appliances.
MST3K: Invasion Of The Neptune Men, 19971011000000 +0000, Our heroes discover just how boring an alien attack on Tokyo can be when they view an anti-vehicle for Sonny Chiba.

programme.title: Hercules Against the Moon Men
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S04E10, A race of evil Moon aliens lands in ancient Greece, wreaking havoc for years on the city of Samar. It’s up to the mighty Hercules to end the chaos.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Out Of This World
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E22, It's Heaven vs. Hell in this short. Plus: bread?

programme.title: Mitchell
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Mitchell, S05E12, The trio sit through a dreary Joe Don Baker disasterpiece as Gypsy tries to find a way to save Joel from being killed by the Mads.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

MST3K: Stranded In Space, 19910629000000 +0000, The gang on the SoL have a gag-weapon war with the Mads and watch an unsuccessful TV pilot about an astronaut stuck on an Earth-like planet where ;perfect order; rules.

Kitten Bowl III, 20160207000000 +0000, Hallmark Channel presents the nation's most athletic, adorable and adoptable kittens in a claws-out, paws-out showdown for Kitten Bowl III. Hosted by Beth Stern, Boomer Esiason, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Kitten Bowl IV, 20170205000000 +0000, The two Feline Football League teams that have cuddled and clawed their way to the top are set to go paw to paw to find out who will win the championship. Hosted by Beth Stern, John Sterling and Mary Carillo.

Kitten Bowl V, 20180204000000 +0000, Kitten Bowl V will tug at your heartstrings and make you say 'aww.' Featuring stories of hope and rehabilitation, action-packed kitten football, and many surprises. Hosted by Beth Stern, Ali Sweeney and Dean Cain.

Kitten Bowl VI, 20190203000000 +0000, This yearly special event features adorable, cuddly and adoptable kittens playing in a two-hour feline catstravaganza. Hosted by Beth Stern and play-by-play with Dean Cain and Rodney Peete.

Kitten Bowl VII, 20200202000000 +0000, Adorable and adoptable kittens compete for the coveted Kitten Bowl VII trophy. Featuring inspirational stories of felines that will warm your heart and some sweet surprises. Hosted by Beth Stern, Jill Wagner and Brennan Elliott.

Once Upon a Winter's Date, 20210214000000 +0000, Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

The Santa Suit, 20101202000000 +0000, Drake Hunter (Kevin Sorbo), the president of Hunter Marketing, has the perfect plan to boost sales for his father's toy company over the holiday season—hire department store Santas to promote his father's merchandise.

Fallen Angel, 19981231000000 +0000, A high-powered Los Angeles lawyer returns to his deceased father's home in Maine where he is reunited with his past. Stars Gary Sinise, and Joely Richardson. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

Signed, Sealed, Delivered, 20131012000000 +0000, A mix up on her first day of work sends Shane to the Dead Letter Office, where a group of quirky characters led by Oliver try to deliver the undeliverable. Stars Eric Mabius and Kristin Booth. SSD Movie #1.

programme.title: Mckay And Mrs. Miller
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E08, McKay is called back to earth to convince his estranged sister, Jeannie Miller, to assist the Air Force. McKay and Jeannie travel to Atlantis and begin the experiment which is initially successful until a McKay from the parallel universe appears.

programme.title: Visitation
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E09, With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those who’ve returned.

programme.title: Resurgence
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E10, In the hopes of finding something beneficial, the crew follows an energy signature that leads them to a mysterious sea of lifeless ships. With no visible signs of danger, the crew set off to take a closer look. But things may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E11, Locked in a battle with a Drone Command Ship, the Destiny is surprised by the arrival of the aliens that abducted Rush and Chloe. After Destiny's position is revealed, the crew again comes under heavy attack. But this time, they have a plan.

programme.title: Twin Destinies
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E12, Excitement spreads through the ship as Eli believes he’s found a way to dial Earth. But Dr. Rush has serious reservations about abandoning Destiny, and when the crew is interrupted by a distress call, it may just change the plans of the Destiny.

programme.title: The Torment Of Tantalus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E11, Dr. Daniel Jackson discovers that in 1945, a young professor slipped through the Stargate, never to return. Together with his still living fiancée, the SG-1 team discovers the now aged professor trapped in a decaying fortress.

programme.title: Bloodlines
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E12, With the proviso that he bring back a Goa'uld larva for study, Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns to Chulak to stop the Goa'uld from enslaving his son Rya'c. Trouble is, Rya'c needs a larva to survive - and the only one available is Teal'c's.

programme.title: Fire And Water
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E13, The SG-1 team returns from the planet Oannes in a panic and minus Daniel Jackson, who was last seen being consumed by a column of flames. But as his comrades mourn him on Earth, Daniel is the captive of an amphibious humanoid creature known as Nem.

programme.title: Hathor
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E14, The evil Goa'uld Hathor (Suanne Braun) escapes from a Mayan pyramid in Mexico. At the Stargate facility, she uses her charms to seduce the men into helping her take over the world. Can Samantha Carter and her female colleagues defeat her?

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E15, Capt. Carter returns with the sole survivor of a planetary plague - a little girl, Cassandra. As they become attached, Carter discovers the girl's terrible secret - a time bomb implanted by the Goa'uld. Can she save the girl - and the world?

programme.title: Cor-Ai
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E16, Colonel Jack O'Neill and the team travel to Chartago, where Teal'c is recognized as once having been head Jaffa to the sinister Goa'uld Apothis. He's arrested for murder and put on trial for his life. Can his comrades save him?

programme.title: Enigma
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E17, The SG-1 team rescues a group of highly developed survivors from the cataclysmic planet of Tollan. To stop the legendary knowledge of the Tollan people from falling into the wrong hands, O'Neill and his team stake all on the cross-universal rescue.

programme.title: Solitudes
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E18, Following a Stargate technical defect, O'Neill and Carter find themselves stranded on an icy wasteland. O'Neill is severely wounded, both are freezing to death, and nobody can find the section of the universe in which they are stranded!

programme.title: Tin Man
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E19, Upon landing on Planet PX3 989, the mysterious alien Harlan renders the SG-1 team unconscious. After waking and returning to Earth, they find that their spirits and minds have been transferred to androids. Can the team regain their bodies and souls?

programme.title: There But For The Grace Of God
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E20, A mysterious mirror transports Dr. Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) to another dimension. Suddenly he finds himself on an alternate Earth that is under attack from the Goa'uld. Can he return to his dimension and save the world?

programme.title: Politics
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E21, Only Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) knows of the Goa'uld plans to invade Earth. But no one takes his warnings seriously - in fact, this time the authorities have chosen to terminate the costly Stargate program and close the gate forever.

programme.title: Within The Serpent's Grasp
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E22, To stop the Goa'uld invasion, the SG-1 team disobeys orders and transports itself to the Goa'uld attack headquarters. Landing amidst preparations for an all-out strike on Earth, the way home is blocked. Can the team avert disaster and save humanity?

programme.title: The Child Inside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E11, The Baywatch lifeguards stage a beach-oriented Special Olympics, becoming involved with two young physically-challenged athletes whose parents have abandoned them.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E12, Jesse Majors, the beautiful motorcycle racer that Matt fell in love with, returns, putting strain on Matt and Summer’s relationship.

programme.title: The Red Knights
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E13, An ad hoc reunion of elite 1950s lifeguards, the "Red Knights," triggers a bar brawl and Ben's resignation. Meanwhile, Mitch helps deliver a baby when the mother goes into premature labor while swimming at the beach.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E14, The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by the hotel's legendary ghost. CJ grows attached to an orphaned dolphin at Sea World. And Mitch is stranded at sea with his brother when their sailboat capsizes.

programme.title: Coronado Del Soul, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E15, Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep himself and Buzzy alive through the long, cold night. CJ unites an orphaned dolphin with its injured mother, and Summer becomes obsessed with a passionate ghost.

programme.title: Mirror, Mirror
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E16, A beautiful woman and her plain sister compete for Mitch's affection with perilous results. Matt confronts the sudden onset of a paralyzing fear of sharks, that may in reality be a far different fear.

programme.title: The Falcon Manifesto
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E17, An investigative reporter is working on a story which details the sale of U.S. military technology by businessman Edward Falcon. The story is so incriminating that her life is put at risk. Can the Baywatch team help her get out alive?

programme.title: Western Exposure
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E18, Country and Western superstar Jessie Lee Harris takes a detour from his concert schedule and pays a visit to Baywatch in search of his estranged wife and son

programme.title: The Life You Save
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E19, When severe cutbacks put the Baywatch lifeguards’ jobs in jeopardy, Matt and Summer volunteer to guard as civilians. But can they convince the county commissioners to increase the budget before lifeguards are laid off?

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E20, Stephanie Holden spends a week with the Coast Guard to help them crack a dangerous arms smuggling ring.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E21, Matt doesn't know whose story to believe when he tries to reunite a runaway teen and her frantic father. Meanwhile, Stephanie must choose between Mitch and Scott.

programme.title: Rescue Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E22, A Hollywood producer desperate for a new TV series idea observes a rescue on the Baywatch beach and realizes that a television series based on lifeguarding is perfect, sending Baywatch headquarters into a tizzy.

programme.title: Livin' on the Fault, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E01, After a minor earthquake, a geological survey team arrives at Baywatch to place an underwater seismometer in the Malibu fault. Hobie has an argument with his father about his future.

programme.title: Livin' on the Fault, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E02, Stephanie and the geological team are trapped underwater by a massive earthquake! Hobie's and Jackie's lives hang in the balance. It is up to the Baywatch team to save them before it's too late!

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E03, After a recent earthquake which almost took his life, Hobie leaves California to live with his mother in Ohio. When they both show up at headquarters a few weeks later Mitch is surprised, especially when he hears the reason they are there.

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E04, John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in the Baja Run dune buggy race with him. What Mitch doesn’t know is Cort is keeping a secret which could land them both in a Mexican prison.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E05, Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and entrusts Hobie with the responsibility of taking care of himself during that time. But Hobie becomes infatuated with an older girl and is pressured into throwing a party without Mitch’s knowledge.
